items.title: iPhones, prices and Brexit: Your questions about tariffs answered
items.description: Donald Trump slaps much of the world with a 10% baseline tariff while others face even higher rates. Our correspondents answer your questions.

items.title: Is South Africa's coalition government about to fall apart?
items.description: The pro-business DA rejects the budget leaving the ANC to rely on other parties to get it passed in parliament.

items.title: Russia not on Trump's tariff list
items.description: US media quotes the White House press secretary as saying this is because of sanctions on Moscow.

items.title: Hungary withdraws from International Criminal Court during Netanyahu visit
items.description: The move is announced hours after Israel's PM, who is sought under an ICC arrest warrant, arrives in Budapest for a state visit.

items.title: UK set to host 2035 Women's World Cup
items.description: The home nations England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland will likely be hosting the 2035 Women's World Cup as the only 'valid' bid.
